text: Brightly lit, newly renovated food court. Service was friendly, little bit of a wait to takeaway. Bought the twice cooked pork and a veg dish, both tasted very similar. Price was quite high, and it was a bit too salty and oily, overall.

Did not try the fish; we simply ordered what an earlier patron\customer ordered (& collected).  The "ma" 'ness was good.

BUT agree with latest review. BOTH dishes were just too ^damn^ salty!!!  My heartrate totally spiked with the amount of salt in both dishes‚ù£Ô∏è
Cook either did not taste-test or was really *very* generous this evening.  üòí

Later, we did see \ notice the earlier customer (who ordered same dishes below) throw away more than half their portions!!  Guess we were just being too nice; brought up to not waste food, no matter how awful. _sigh_

Probably the best spicy chicken ever. They seem to use two kinds of dried chilis giving a complex spicy flavor

The mala here is still the best in the area
The vegetables got plastic and small flies. Fried intestine tastes like chewing gum. Will not come back again!
Disappointed with the $7.80 malatang set as there's no meat at all inside the bowl. It's just vegetable inside. They should indicate it's a vegetarian malatang. Felt cheated.
